commentary.revenue_performance: Consolidated revenue grew by 7% in INR terms. India business volume grew by 5.2%. International business grew strongly by 18.4% in constant currency.
commentary.profitability: Gross margins expanded by 120 basis points. Operating profit increased by 8.3%. A&P expenditure increased by around 16%.
commentary.business_outlook: Subsequent quarters should be better as rural recovery is in place. Management expects volume growth to **sequentially inch up**.
commentary.key_challenges: Unprecedented heat wave and **high food inflation** were challenges. J&N segment was impacted as consumers shifted to cheaper, thirst-quenching carbonated beverages due to price index increase.
commentary.strategic_initiatives: Oral Care grew 11.4%, Hair Oil 3.3%. Dabur Red gained 15 bps market share. Foods business (including Badshah) grew by 21%. Dabur Oral Care became the number two player nationally.
commentary.market_conditions: Timely arrival of monsoon and rural-centric budget are key positives. Deflation of around 2% was seen in the quarter, aiding consumption.
